creator: jqi@e-duction.com
text:
Apache as proxy server infront of Weblogic 6.1

When we first time hit Apache server which passing JSessionID to backnend, it 
trunc the JsessionID after ";"

such as following URL returns back when error happens
https://www.eductions.com/eductionWebApp/login.jsp?
jsessionid=9GbcPgfpDCh75qPpUTq72yOu659VfpjVd2whlLczekZC4I5SW6hy!1100487015!-
1062707049!8001!7002

creator: nd@perlig.de
text:
A lot of changes were made to mod_proxy in recent versions. Does the problem
still persist?

No further response. Assuming issue resolved.

Please reopen the bug if this is not the case and you can provide the requested
information.

Thanks for using Apache.
creator: nd@perlig.de
